defaultSearch.description: URL for searching scripts, * stands for the keywords.

msgUpdated.description: Message shown when a script is updated/reinstalled.

msgErrorFetchingScript.description: Message shown when Violentmonkey failed fetching a new version of the script.

msgInstalled.description: Message shown when a script is installed.

msgUpdating.description: Message shown when a new version of script is being fetched.

msgNewVersion.description: Message shown when a new version of script is found by @updateURL, but no @downloadURL is provided.

msgCheckingForUpdate.description: Message shown when a script is being checked for updates by version numbers.

msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.description: Message shown when Violentmonkey failed fetching version data of the script.

msgNoUpdate.description: Message shown when there is no new version of a script.

labelInstall.description: Shown in the title of the confirm page while trying to install a script.

optionClose.description: Option to close confirm window after installation.

buttonConfirmInstallation.description: Button to confirm installation of a script.

anchorSupportPage.description: Link to the support page of Violentmonkey.

anchorAuthor.description: Author shown in the footer of options page, translator information may be added.

msgNotJS.message: URL seems not to be Javascript. It will be loaded directly in 3 seconds.
msgNotJS.description: Message shown in the confirm page when loading a URL ends with .user.js but seems not to be Javascript. It will then be loaded again directly in 3 seconds.

msgLoadedJS.description: Message shown in the confirm page when a javascript file to be installed is loaded.

msgErrorLoadingURL.description: Message shown in the confirm page when Violentmonkey failed to load the URL of a script.

msgLoadingURL.description: Message shown in the confirm page when a URL of a script is being loaded.

buttonNew.description: Button to create a new script.

anchorGetMoreScripts.message: Get more scripts from userscripts.org

buttonAdvanced.description: Button to show the advanced options.

labelInstalledScripts.description: Label of the list of installed scripts.

labelShowDetails.description: An option to show the details of scripts, such as author, description, etc.

msgLoading.description: Message shown in the options page before script list is loaded.

labelScriptEditor.description: Shown in the title of the script editing page.

buttonCustomMeta.description: Button to edit the custom meta data of a script.

labelAllowUpdate.description: An option to allow checking updates for a script.

buttonSave.description: Button to save modifications of a script.

buttonSaveClose.description: Button to save modifications of a script and then close the editing page.

labelRunAt.description: Label of script @run-at properties in custom meta data.

labelRunAtDefault.description: Shown when custom @run-at is not assigned.

labelHomepage.description: Label of script @homepage in custom meta data.

labelUpdateURL.description: Label of script @updateURL in custom meta data.

labelDownloadURL.description: Label of script @downloadURL in custom meta data.

labelKeepInclude.description: An option to keep the original @include rules.

labelKeepMatch.description: An option to keep the original @match rules.

labelKeepExclude.description: An option to keep the original @exclude rules.

labelExport.description: Label shown in the title of export dialog.

labelExportScriptData.description: An option to export script data along with scripts.

buttonAllNone.description: Button to select all scripts or none.

labelAdvanced.description: Label shown in the title of advanced dialog.

labelAutoUpdate.message: Automatically check scripts for updates every day
labelAutoUpdate.description: An option to allow automatically checking scripts for updates every 24 hours.

labelSearchLink.description: Label of URL for searching scripts for a site.

labelSearchHint.message: (?)

buttonDefault.description: Button to replace search URL with the default one.

buttonExportData.description: Button to open the data export dialog.

buttonImportData.description: Button to choose a file for data import.

labelVacuumHint.message: (?)

labelNoName.description: Text as the name of a script when no @name is assigned.

labelAuthor.description: Label of author shown in the details of a script.

confirmNotSaved.message:
Modifications are not saved!
Click OK to discard them or cancel to stay.
confirmNotSaved.description: Confirm message shown when there are unsaved script modifications.

msgImported.description: Message shown after import. There is an argument referring to the count of scripts imported.

buttonVacuuming.description: Message shown when data vacuum is in progress.

buttonExporting.description: Message shown when data export is in progress.

buttonVacuumed.description: Message shown when data is vacuumed.

menuManageScripts.description: Menu item to manage scripts, or to open the options page of the extension.

menuFindScripts.description: Menu item to find scripts for a site.

menuScriptEnabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Violentmonkey, whether enabled.

menuBack.description: Menu item to go back to main menu from script commands.

menuCommands.description: Menu item to list script commands.
